tophersmith.security.headers.csp.directives.impl

Class StyleSrcDirective

  • java.lang.Object
    • tophersmith.security.headers.csp.directives.AbstractCSPDirective
      • tophersmith.security.headers.csp.directives.AbstractSrcDirective
        • tophersmith.security.headers.csp.directives.AbstractUnsafeDirective
          • tophersmith.security.headers.csp.directives.impl.StyleSrcDirective

  • public class StyleSrcDirective
extends AbstractUnsafeDirective
    From https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Content_Security_Policy_Cheat_Sheet}
    The script-src directive restricts which styles the user may applies to the protected resource. Additional restrictions against inline and eval. This directive relies on the CSP default-src list if this directive is undefined. See http://www.w3.org/TR/CSP2/#directive-base-uri
    Author:
    Chris Smith

      • addHash

        public StyleSrcDirective addHash(String hashType,
                        String b64Hash)
        adds the value '${hashType}-${b64Hash}' to the directive
        Parameters:
        hashType - one of "sha256", "sha384", or "sha512"
        b64Hash - a base-64 encoded hash of a script
        Returns:
        a reference to this object
